summary: Previous idempotency key validation issues have been addressed with a shared validator used on both invoke and stream routes, and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: X-Idempotency-Key validation did not reject multiple header values and did not validate allowed charset
previous_issues_status.notes: Shared validateIdempotencyKeyHeader now rejects array headers, enforces max length, and validates printable ASCII characters.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Stream endpoint repeated the same incomplete idempotency key validation and needed shared validation
previous_issues_status.notes: Stream endpoint now uses the shared validateIdempotencyKeyHeader function.
